channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: India disrupts access to popular developer platform Supabase with blocking order
item.description: India, one of Supabase’s biggest markets, is seeing patchy access after a government block order.

item.title: Anthropic Hits Back After US Military Labels It a 'Supply Chain Risk'
item.description: Anthropic says it would be “legally unsound” for the Pentagon to blacklist its technology after talks over military use of its artificial intelligence models broke down.

item.title: Defense secretary Pete Hegseth designates Anthropic a supply chain risk
item.description: Nearly two hours after President Donald Trump announced on Truth Social that he was banning Anthropic products from the federal government, Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth took it one step further and announced that he was now designating the AI company as a "supply-chain risk," which Anthropic says it is willing to challenge in court. […]
